channel.title: Web3 Core Platform Updates
channel.description: Latest updates, additions, and fixes to the Web3 Core educational platform

item.title: Game Theory Interactive Module Launched
item.dc:creator: Dev Team
item.description: Our new interactive Game Theory module is now available! Explore how blockchain consensus mechanisms use game theory principles through hands-on simulations.
item.content:encoded:
Game Theory Interactive Module Launched

Our new interactive Game Theory module is now available! Explore how blockchain consensus mechanisms use game theory principles through hands-on simulations. This module includes:

  • Interactive Prisoner's Dilemma simulator
  • Nash Equilibrium visualization tool
  • Network validation game with multiple actor types
  • Comparison of different consensus mechanisms through game theory lens

Access this new content in the Education & Recreation Center under the Learning Games tab.

item.title: Blockchain Builder Game Updated
item.dc:creator: Gaming Team
item.description: The Blockchain Builder game now includes new attack scenarios and defense mechanisms. Test your blockchain against Sybil attacks and improve your security.
item.content:encoded:
Blockchain Builder Game Updated

The Blockchain Builder game now includes new attack scenarios and defense mechanisms. Test your blockchain against Sybil attacks and improve your security.

New features include:

  • Sybil attack simulation with configurable attack parameters
  • New defense mechanism options including reputation systems
  • Historical blockchain attack case studies
  • Improved visualization of network health during attacks

item.title: Community Events Calendar Integration
item.dc:creator: Community Team
item.description: You can now sync our events to your personal calendar with one click. Never miss a workshop, hackathon, or community meetup!
item.content:encoded:
Community Events Calendar Integration

You can now sync our events to your personal calendar with one click. Never miss a workshop, hackathon, or community meetup!

This new feature works with:

  • Google Calendar
  • Apple Calendar
  • Microsoft Outlook
  • Any calendar app that supports .ics files

Simply click the "Add to Calendar" button next to any event listing.

item.title: Wallet Connection Issue Resolved
item.dc:creator: Support Team
item.description: Fixed connectivity issues affecting some users when connecting MetaMask wallets to the Recreation Center games. All interactive features should now work properly.
item.content:encoded:
Wallet Connection Issue Resolved

We've fixed connectivity issues affecting some users when connecting MetaMask wallets to the Recreation Center games. All interactive features should now work properly.

The fix addresses:

  • Connection timeouts with MetaMask extension v11.3
  • Incorrect network detection on mobile wallets
  • Token balance display issues after wallet reconnection

If you're still experiencing wallet connection issues, please clear your browser cache and try again, or contact support for assistance.

item.title: Token Rewards System Enhanced
item.dc:creator: Tokenomics Team
item.description: The Learn & Earn system now includes tiered rewards. Regular participation unlocks bonus multipliers for increased STREAM token earnings!
item.content:encoded:
Token Rewards System Enhanced

The Learn & Earn system now includes tiered rewards. Regular participation unlocks bonus multipliers for increased STREAM token earnings!

New reward features include:

  • Participation streak bonuses (daily, weekly, monthly)
  • Completion multipliers based on difficulty level
  • Special event double-reward periods
  • Community contribution bonuses

Check out the updated rewards tab to see your current tier and available bonuses.
